sentences.en: " I wasn't intending to go,'said the manager easily. " I'll subscribe, of course.
sentences.cn: “ 我原来不打算去的, " 经理随随便便地说, " 当然票是要认购的.

sentences.en: Each employee may subscribe for up to £2,000 worth of shares.
sentences.cn: 每位员工最高可以认购价值 2,000 英镑的股份。

sentences.en: Hegelian idealists subscribe to a general doctrine about the internality of relations.
sentences.cn: 黑格尔唯心主义者赞同这种关于关系的内在性的一般学说.

sentences.en: How many shares did you subscribe for in the new company?
sentences.cn: 那新公司你认了多少股份?

sentences.en: How much did you subscribe for?
sentences.cn: 你捐了多少?

sentences.en: I heartily subscribe to that sentiment.
sentences.cn: 我十分赞同那个观点.

sentences.en: I subscribe to a few favourite charities.
sentences.cn: 我定期向几个中意的慈善机构捐款。

sentences.en: I subscribe wholeheartedly to this theory.
sentences.cn: 我衷心拥护这种理论.

sentences.en: I will subscribe to any eulogy of him.
sentences.cn: 我愿把所有的赞词都奉献给他.

sentences.en: I'll write and subscribe right now -- tomorrow it maybe too late. "
sentences.cn: 我马上写信,现在就投 —— 明天就怕来不及了. ”

sentences.en: I've personally never subscribed to the view that either sex is superior to the other.
sentences.cn: 我个人从未持有过一种性别比另一种性别优越的观点。

sentences.en: If you subscribe to the newspaper, it'll be delivered to your door.
sentences.cn: 如果你订阅报纸, 它会直接给你送到门上的.

sentences.en: My main reason for subscribing to New Scientist is to keep abreast of advances in science.
sentences.cn: 我订阅《新科学家》的主要原因是要跟上科学的进步。

sentences.en: The magazine is trying to get more readers to subscribe.
sentences.cn: 该杂志正大力发展新订户.

sentences.en: The tour of Edinburgh is fully subscribed.
sentences.cn: 去爱丁堡旅游的名额已经满了。

sentences.en: Usenet is a collection of discussion groups, known as newsgroups, to which anybody can subscribe.
sentences.cn: 全球新闻网络是由多个被称为新闻组的讨论组组成，任何人都可以注册加入。

sentences.en: WE mustn't subscribe till we've got the money; don't you know that? "
sentences.cn: 那笔钱不到手,咱们就买不了股, 这你还不知道 吗 ? ”

sentences.en: We subscribe to the resolution.
sentences.cn: 我们赞同这项决议.

sentences.en: Which journals does the library subscribe to?
sentences.cn: 图书馆订有哪些报刊？

sentences.en: You can subscribe to the magazine for as little as 32 a year.
sentences.cn: 一年只需 32 美元就可以订阅这份杂志。

words.tran_cn: 订阅；捐款；[经]认购；赞成；签署

trans.tran_cn: 订阅；捐款；认购；赞成；签署
trans.tran_en: to pay money, usually once a year, to have copies of a newspaper or magazine sent to you, or to have some other service

trans.tran_cn: 订阅，订购；认购；同意，赞成
trans.tran_en: to pay money, usually once a year, to have copies of a newspaper or magazine sent to you, or to have some other service

trans.tran_cn: 认捐，捐赠，签署，题词，署名，认购，订阅，订购
捐款，捐助；订阅；同意，赞成
trans.tran_en: to pay money, usually once a year, to have copies of a newspaper or magazine sent to you, or to have some other service
